text: the legs - Disproportionate short-limb short stature - Dysplastic iliac wings - Flat acetabular roof - Hypoplastic pubic bone - Irregular epiphyses - Limited elbow extension - Lumbar hyperlordosis - Metaphyseal spurs - Metaphyseal widening - Micromelia - Narrow iliac wings - Ovoid vertebral bodies - Platyspondyly - Posterior rib cupping - Short long bone - Small epiphyses - Spondyloepimetaphyseal dysplasia - Thoracic hypoplasia - Waddling gait - The Human Phenotype Ontology (HPO) has collected
